title: Banana Oat Pancakes
description: Fluffy and healthy pancakes made with banana, oats, and egg.
steps: Mash banana in a bowl and mix with egg.
Blend in oats and cinnamon until smooth.
Cook small pancakes on a non-stick pan until golden.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
description: A protein-packed parfait with yogurt, granola, and berries.
steps: Layer half of the yogurt in a glass.
Top with remaining yogurt and enjoy.

title: Avocado Egg Salad Wrap
description: A creamy and filling avocado-egg wrap perfect for lunch.
steps: Mash avocado and mix with chopped boiled eggs.
Spread onto tortilla, wrap, and slice in half.

title: Quinoa Veggie Bowl
description: A wholesome bowl with quinoa, broccoli, and chickpeas.

title: Grilled Salmon & Spinach
description: Protein-rich grilled salmon served on a bed of spinach.
steps: Brush salmon with olive oil and grill until cooked.
Sauté spinach lightly in olive oil.
Serve salmon on spinach, squeeze lemon on top.

title: Chicken & Sweet Potato Bake
description: Tender chicken baked with sweet potato and paprika.
steps: Toss sweet potato cubes with olive oil and paprika.
Place chicken and sweet potato on a baking tray.
